rules.natural: If the factory requires safety approval, then the company is profitable.
Whenever the factory produces experimental drug, the experimental drug contains new compound.
If the factory produces experimental drug, then the experimental drug is patented.
Given that the factory produces experimental drug, it is not the case that the experimental drug is effective.
Should the experimental drug contain new compound, then the experimental drug is tested.
Whenever the inspector finds violation, then if the factory is contaminated, the factory is clean.
Either the inspector finds violation or the lab confirms violation.
The factory has contamination or the factory requires safety approval.
Under the condition that the lab confirms violation, then if the factory is contaminated, the factory is clean.
Provided that the consultant suggests changes, then if the factory is not compliant, the factory violates regulations.
Whenever the advisor recommends changes, then if the factory is not compliant, the factory violates regulations.
Provided that the regulator halts production, then the factory does not produce experimental drug.
The regulator halts production or the regulator investigates the factory.
Under the condition that the regulator investigates the factory, the regulator discovers issues.
If the regulator identifies problems, then the factory does not produce experimental drug.
Either the regulator approves restart or if it is not the case that if the regulator discovers issues then the regulator identifies problems, then the factory is cleared.
Provided that the agency monitors situation, then if the regulator approves restart, the factory resumes production.
Whenever the factory maintains standards, the factory is compliant.
The factory maintains standards or the factory improves processes.
Either the factory meets requirements or if it is not the case that if the factory improves processes then the factory is compliant, then the factory does not fail audit.
The factory exceeds requirements or the factory does not meet requirements.
If the factory uses banned substance, then the drug contains banned substance.
Under the condition that the researcher documents results, then if the experimental drug is patented, the experimental drug is effective.
The researcher documents results or the scientist verifies results.
Should the scientist verify results, then if the experimental drug is patented, the experimental drug is effective.
The equipment is damaged or the factory is not approved.
The technician repairs equipment or the technician replaces equipment.
Whenever the technician replaces equipment, then the equipment is not damaged.
Under the condition that the engineer checks equipment, then if the technician repairs equipment, the equipment is not damaged.
If the equipment is functional, then the factory is not approved.
Whenever the worker follows procedures, then the worker is trained.
Should the worker be trained, then the worker is certified.
Either the worker deviates procedures or if the worker is certified, then if the equipment is not functional, the equipment is not malfunctioning.
The factory is approved or the factory is not operating.
If the factory is compliant, then the factory is not approved.
Provided that it is not the case that if the inspector reports the factory then if the factory is unsafe then the factory is not safe, then the factory is contaminated.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the inspector reports the factory then if the factory is unsafe then the factory is not safe, then the factory is not clean.
Should it not be the case that the consultant suggests changes or the advisor recommends changes, then the factory rejects changes.
Provided that it is not the case that if the factory rejects changes then the factory implements changes, then the factory appeals decision.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the factory rejects changes then the factory implements changes, then the factory does not appeal decision.
If it is not the case that if the factory passes inspection then the factory does not have contamination, then the factory uses banned substance.
Provided that it is not the case that if the factory improves processes then the factory is compliant, then the factory fails audit.
Should it not be the case that if the factory uses banned substance then the drug does not contain banned substance, then the factory receives warning.
Whenever it is not the case that if the factory uses banned substance then the drug does not contain banned substance, then the factory does not receive warning.
Provided that it is not the case that if the factory is not compliant then the factory violates regulations, then the factory produces experimental drug.
If the equipment is not functional, then the equipment is malfunctioning.
If the company is not profitable, then the factory is safe.
Provided that the company is not profitable, then the factory is unsafe.
Whenever the company is not profitable, then the factory is operating.
